class_notes: Class is Wednesday 1-4 class contingent on being able to work with Dr. in clinics and hospitals
course_description: Much more than a shadowing program, NBB 490 offers a genuine clinical neurology experience, classroom guidance and a look at current practices in medicine. Each student will be assigned a Clinical Neurology faculty mentor and will be required to attend a minimum of one half-day clinic per week.
